sqlMap.select: SELECT TYPE_NAME from FORM_ITEM_TYPE where ADDITIONAL_INFO_IND='Y'
sqlMap.sql: FORM_ID, FORM_DESC, FORM_TITLE, LAYOUT, TOTAL_COLUMNS, BUNDLE_KEY, DATASOURCE_CLASS, FORM_LOGO, LABEL_ALIGN_TYPE, INITIAL_MULTIPLICITY, CHANNEL_ID, LABEL_CHAR_COUNT

FID.ITEM_ID, FID.FORM_ID, FID.PARENT_ID, FIT.TYPE_NAME ITEM_TYPE, FID.POSITION, FID.DISPLAY_NM_KEY, FID.PLAIN_LBL, FID.LAYOUT, FID.ANCHOR, FID.BUNDLE_KEY, FID.MIN_LENGTH, FID.MAX_LENGTH, FID.MAX_NUM_LINES, FID.MAX_CHAR_PER_LINES, FID.TOTAL_COLS, FID.ROW_SPAN, FID.COL_SPAN, FID.VALIDATION_TYPE, FID.RAW_KEYS, FID.RAW_VALUES, FID.INCLUDE_SELECT_IND, FID.CONTAINER_IND, FID.VISIBLE_IND, FID.EDITABLE_IND, FID.READ_ONLY_IND, FID.REQUIRED_IND, FID.LOOKUP_IND, FID.COLLAPSIBLE_FIRST_IND, FID.DS_VIEW_ID, FID.DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID, FID.DS_VAL_COLUMN_ID, FID.WIDGET_ID, DECODE (FID.DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID, NULL,NULL, (SELECT DISTINCT VCD.DATA_TYPE FROM VIEW_COLUMN_DEFINITION VCD JOIN WIDGET_DEFINITION WD ON(WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID=VCD.VIEW_ID) WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID =FID.WIDGET_ID AND VCD.COLUMN_ID =FID.DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID )) COLUMN_TYPE, DECODE (FID.WIDGET_ID, NULL,NULL, (SELECT DISTINCT VD.PRODUCT FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID )) WIDGET_PRODUCT_CODE, DECODE (FID.WIDGET_ID, NULL,NULL, (SELECT DISTINCT VD.SUB_PRODUCT FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID )) WIDGET_SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, DECODE (FID.WIDGET_ID, NULL,NULL, (SELECT DISTINCT VD.FUNCTION_CODE FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID )) WIDGET_FUNCTION_CODE, FID.CONDITIONAL_IND, FID.CACHE_DATA_IND, DECODE(FID.HIDE_LABEL, NULL, 'N', FID.HIDE_LABEL) HIDE_LABEL, FID.CONTEXT_CONATINER_IND, FID.CRITERIA_ID_REQ_IND, FID.VALIDATE_ON_SWITCH_IND, FID.LINKED_CURR_COL , FID.RESIZABLE_IND, FID.UPLOAD_FILE_FORMATS, FID.MULTI_LANG_IND, FID.LABEL_ALIGN_TYPE, FID.HIDE_LABEL, FID.PRINT_REQUIRED_IND, FID.CHANNEL_ID, FID.APPEND_CURRENCY_MODE, FID.TOGGLE_IND, FID.LABEL_CHAR_COUNT, FID.COPY_PASTE_IND
sqlMap.select:
SELECT FORM_ID ITEM_KEY,
from FORM_DEFINITION WHERE FORM_ID IN
#FORM_IDS[]#

WITH N ( RANK, ITEM_ID, FORM_ID, PARENT_ID, TYPE_NAME, ITEM_TYPE, POSITION, DISPLAY_NM_KEY, PLAIN_LBL, LAYOUT, ANCHOR, BUNDLE_KEY, MIN_LENGTH, MAX_LENGTH, MAX_NUM_LINES, MAX_CHAR_PER_LINES, TOTAL_COLS, ROW_SPAN, COL_SPAN, VALIDATION_TYPE, RAW_KEYS, RAW_VALUES, INCLUDE_SELECT_IND, CONTAINER_IND, VISIBLE_IND, EDITABLE_IND, READ_ONLY_IND, REQUIRED_IND, LOOKUP_IND, COLLAPSIBLE_FIRST_IND, DS_VIEW_ID, DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID, DS_VAL_COLUMN_ID, WIDGET_ID, COLUMN_TYPE, WIDGET_PRODUCT_CODE, WIDGET_SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, WIDGET_FUNCTION_CODE, CONDITIONAL_IND, CACHE_DATA_IND, HIDE_LABEL, CONTEXT_CONATINER_IND, CRITERIA_ID_REQ_IND, VALIDATE_ON_SWITCH_IND, LINKED_CURR_COL , RESIZABLE_IND, UPLOAD_FILE_FORMATS, MULTI_LANG_IND, LABEL_ALIGN_TYPE, PRINT_REQUIRED_IND, CHANNEL_ID, APPEND_CURRENCY_MODE, TOGGLE_IND, LABEL_CHAR_COUNT, COPY_PASTE_IND , LEVEL ) AS ( SELECT cast('1'|| POSITION as varchar(1000)) as rank , FID.ITEM_ID, FID.FORM_ID, FID.PARENT_ID, FIT.TYPE_NAME, FIT.TYPE_NAME ITEM_TYPE, FID.POSITION, FID.DISPLAY_NM_KEY, FID.PLAIN_LBL, FID.LAYOUT, FID.ANCHOR, FID.BUNDLE_KEY, FID.MIN_LENGTH, FID.MAX_LENGTH, FID.MAX_NUM_LINES, FID.MAX_CHAR_PER_LINES, FID.TOTAL_COLS, FID.ROW_SPAN, FID.COL_SPAN, FID.VALIDATION_TYPE, FID.RAW_KEYS, FID.RAW_VALUES, FID.INCLUDE_SELECT_IND, FID.CONTAINER_IND, FID.VISIBLE_IND, FID.EDITABLE_IND, FID.READ_ONLY_IND, FID.REQUIRED_IND, FID.LOOKUP_IND, FID.COLLAPSIBLE_FIRST_IND, FID.DS_VIEW_ID, FID.DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID, FID.DS_VAL_COLUMN_ID, FID.WIDGET_ID, (SELECT DISTINCT VCD.DATA_TYPE FROM VIEW_COLUMN_DEFINITION VCD JOIN WIDGET_DEFINITION WD ON(WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID=VCD.VIEW_ID) WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID =FID.WIDGET_ID AND VCD.COLUMN_ID =FID.DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID ) COLUMN_TYPE, (SELECT DISTINCT VD.PRODUCT FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID ) AS WIDGET_PRODUCT_CODE, (SELECT DISTINCT VD.SUB_PRODUCT FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID ) AS WIDGET_SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, (SELECT DISTINCT VD.FUNCTION_CODE FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID ) AS WIDGET_FUNCTION_CODE, FID.CONDITIONAL_IND, FID.CACHE_DATA_IND, HIDE_LABEL, FID.CONTEXT_CONATINER_IND, FID.CRITERIA_ID_REQ_IND, FID.VALIDATE_ON_SWITCH_IND, FID.LINKED_CURR_COL , FID.RESIZABLE_IND, FID.UPLOAD_FILE_FORMATS, FID.MULTI_LANG_IND, FID.LABEL_ALIGN_TYPE, FID.PRINT_REQUIRED_IND, FID.CHANNEL_ID, FID.APPEND_CURRENCY_MODE, FID.TOGGLE_IND, FID.LABEL_CHAR_COUNT, FID.COPY_PASTE_IND,
1 AS LEVEL
FROM FORM_ITEM_DEFINITION FID JOIN FORM_ITEM_TYPE FIT ON (FIT.TYPE_ID= FID.ITEM_TYPE) WHERE FID.FORM_ID=#FORM_ID# AND FID.PARENT_ID=#FORM_ID# UNION ALL SELECT N.rank||' '||to_char(NEXTLEVEL.POSITION) AS rank, NEXTLEVEL.ITEM_ID, NEXTLEVEL.FORM_ID, NEXTLEVEL.PARENT_ID, NEXTLEVEL.TYPE_NAME, NEXTLEVEL.ITEM_TYPE, NEXTLEVEL.POSITION, NEXTLEVEL.DISPLAY_NM_KEY, NEXTLEVEL.PLAIN_LBL, NEXTLEVEL.LAYOUT, NEXTLEVEL.ANCHOR, NEXTLEVEL.BUNDLE_KEY, NEXTLEVEL.MIN_LENGTH, NEXTLEVEL.MAX_LENGTH, NEXTLEVEL.MAX_NUM_LINES, NEXTLEVEL.MAX_CHAR_PER_LINES, NEXTLEVEL.TOTAL_COLS, NEXTLEVEL.ROW_SPAN, NEXTLEVEL.COL_SPAN, NEXTLEVEL.VALIDATION_TYPE, NEXTLEVEL.RAW_KEYS, NEXTLEVEL.RAW_VALUES, NEXTLEVEL.INCLUDE_SELECT_IND, NEXTLEVEL.CONTAINER_IND, NEXTLEVEL.VISIBLE_IND, NEXTLEVEL.EDITABLE_IND, NEXTLEVEL.READ_ONLY_IND, NEXTLEVEL.REQUIRED_IND, NEXTLEVEL.LOOKUP_IND, NEXTLEVEL.COLLAPSIBLE_FIRST_IND, NEXTLEVEL.DS_VIEW_ID, NEXTLEVEL.DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID, NEXTLEVEL.DS_VAL_COLUMN_ID, NEXTLEVEL.WIDGET_ID, NEXTLEVEL.COLUMN_TYPE, NEXTLEVEL.WIDGET_PRODUCT_CODE, NEXTLEVEL.WIDGET_SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, NEXTLEVEL.WIDGET_FUNCTION_CODE, NEXTLEVEL.CONDITIONAL_IND, NEXTLEVEL.CACHE_DATA_IND, NEXTLEVEL.HIDE_LABEL, NEXTLEVEL.CONTEXT_CONATINER_IND, NEXTLEVEL.CRITERIA_ID_REQ_IND, NEXTLEVEL.VALIDATE_ON_SWITCH_IND, NEXTLEVEL.LINKED_CURR_COL , NEXTLEVEL.RESIZABLE_IND, NEXTLEVEL.UPLOAD_FILE_FORMATS, NEXTLEVEL.MULTI_LANG_IND, NEXTLEVEL.LABEL_ALIGN_TYPE, NEXTLEVEL.PRINT_REQUIRED_IND, NEXTLEVEL.CHANNEL_ID, NEXTLEVEL.APPEND_CURRENCY_MODE, NEXTLEVEL.TOGGLE_IND, NEXTLEVEL.LABEL_CHAR_COUNT, NEXTLEVEL.COPY_PASTE_IND, N.LEVEL+1 AS LEVEL FROM ( SELECT FID.ITEM_ID, FID.FORM_ID, FID.PARENT_ID, FIT.TYPE_NAME, FIT.TYPE_NAME as ITEM_TYPE, FID.POSITION, FID.DISPLAY_NM_KEY, FID.PLAIN_LBL, FID.LAYOUT, FID.ANCHOR, FID.BUNDLE_KEY, FID.MIN_LENGTH, FID.MAX_LENGTH, FID.MAX_NUM_LINES, FID.MAX_CHAR_PER_LINES, FID.TOTAL_COLS, FID.ROW_SPAN, FID.COL_SPAN, FID.VALIDATION_TYPE, FID.RAW_KEYS, FID.RAW_VALUES, FID.INCLUDE_SELECT_IND, FID.CONTAINER_IND, FID.VISIBLE_IND, FID.EDITABLE_IND, FID.READ_ONLY_IND, FID.REQUIRED_IND, FID.LOOKUP_IND, FID.COLLAPSIBLE_FIRST_IND, FID.DS_VIEW_ID, FID.DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID, FID.DS_VAL_COLUMN_ID, FID.WIDGET_ID, (SELECT VCD.DATA_TYPE FROM VIEW_COLUMN_DEFINITION VCD JOIN WIDGET_DEFINITION WD ON(WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID=VCD.VIEW_ID) WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID =FID.WIDGET_ID AND VCD.COLUMN_ID =FID.DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID ) COLUMN_TYPE, (SELECT VD.PRODUCT FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID ) AS WIDGET_PRODUCT_CODE, (SELECT VD.SUB_PRODUCT FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID ) AS WIDGET_SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, (SELECT VD.FUNCTION_CODE FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID ) AS WIDGET_FUNCTION_CODE, FID.CONDITIONAL_IND, FID.CACHE_DATA_IND, HIDE_LABEL, FID.CONTEXT_CONATINER_IND, FID.CRITERIA_ID_REQ_IND, FID.VALIDATE_ON_SWITCH_IND, FID.LINKED_CURR_COL , FID.RESIZABLE_IND, FID.UPLOAD_FILE_FORMATS, FID.MULTI_LANG_IND, FID.LABEL_ALIGN_TYPE, FID.PRINT_REQUIRED_IND, FID.CHANNEL_ID, FID.APPEND_CURRENCY_MODE, FID.TOGGLE_IND, FID.LABEL_CHAR_COUNT, FID.COPY_PASTE_IND FROM FORM_ITEM_DEFINITION FID JOIN FORM_ITEM_TYPE FIT ON (FIT.TYPE_ID = FID.ITEM_TYPE)) NEXTLEVEL, N WHERE (( N.FORM_ID = NEXTLEVEL.FORM_ID AND N.ITEM_ID = NEXTLEVEL.PARENT_ID AND N.ITEM_TYPE != '18' ) AND N.ITEM_TYPE != '18' ) OR (N.ITEM_ID = NEXTLEVEL.FORM_ID AND NEXTLEVEL.PARENT_ID = NEXTLEVEL.FORM_ID AND N.ITEM_TYPE = '18' )) SELECT RANK, ITEM_ID, FORM_ID, PARENT_ID, TYPE_NAME, ITEM_TYPE, POSITION, DISPLAY_NM_KEY, PLAIN_LBL, LAYOUT, ANCHOR, BUNDLE_KEY, MIN_LENGTH, MAX_LENGTH, MAX_NUM_LINES, MAX_CHAR_PER_LINES, TOTAL_COLS, ROW_SPAN, COL_SPAN, VALIDATION_TYPE, RAW_KEYS, RAW_VALUES, INCLUDE_SELECT_IND, CONTAINER_IND, VISIBLE_IND, EDITABLE_IND, READ_ONLY_IND, REQUIRED_IND, LOOKUP_IND, COLLAPSIBLE_FIRST_IND, DS_VIEW_ID, DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID, DS_VAL_COLUMN_ID, WIDGET_ID, COLUMN_TYPE, WIDGET_PRODUCT_CODE, WIDGET_SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, WIDGET_FUNCTION_CODE, CONDITIONAL_IND, CACHE_DATA_IND, HIDE_LABEL, CONTEXT_CONATINER_IND, CRITERIA_ID_REQ_IND, VALIDATE_ON_SWITCH_IND, LINKED_CURR_COL , RESIZABLE_IND, UPLOAD_FILE_FORMATS, MULTI_LANG_IND, LABEL_ALIGN_TYPE, PRINT_REQUIRED_IND, CHANNEL_ID, APPEND_CURRENCY_MODE, TOGGLE_IND, LABEL_CHAR_COUNT, COPY_PASTE_IND FROM N ORDER BY RANK

WITH N ( RANK, ITEM_KEY, ITEM_ID, FORM_ID, PARENT_ID, TYPE_NAME, ITEM_TYPE, POSITION, DISPLAY_NM_KEY, PLAIN_LBL, LAYOUT, ANCHOR, BUNDLE_KEY, MIN_LENGTH, MAX_LENGTH, MAX_NUM_LINES, MAX_CHAR_PER_LINES, TOTAL_COLS, ROW_SPAN, COL_SPAN, VALIDATION_TYPE, RAW_KEYS, RAW_VALUES, INCLUDE_SELECT_IND, CONTAINER_IND, VISIBLE_IND, EDITABLE_IND, READ_ONLY_IND, REQUIRED_IND, LOOKUP_IND, COLLAPSIBLE_FIRST_IND, DS_VIEW_ID, DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID, DS_VAL_COLUMN_ID, WIDGET_ID, COLUMN_TYPE, WIDGET_PRODUCT_CODE, WIDGET_SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, WIDGET_FUNCTION_CODE, CONDITIONAL_IND, CACHE_DATA_IND, HIDE_LABEL, CONTEXT_CONATINER_IND, CRITERIA_ID_REQ_IND, VALIDATE_ON_SWITCH_IND, LINKED_CURR_COL , RESIZABLE_IND, UPLOAD_FILE_FORMATS, MULTI_LANG_IND, LABEL_ALIGN_TYPE, PRINT_REQUIRED_IND, CHANNEL_ID, APPEND_CURRENCY_MODE, TOGGLE_IND, LABEL_CHAR_COUNT , LEVEL ) AS ( SELECT cast('1'|| POSITION as varchar(1000)) as rank ,
to_char(FID.FORM_ID)||'|||'||to_char(FID.ITEM_ID) ITEM_KEY, FID.ITEM_ID, FID.FORM_ID, FID.PARENT_ID, FIT.TYPE_NAME, FIT.TYPE_NAME ITEM_TYPE, FID.POSITION, FID.DISPLAY_NM_KEY, FID.PLAIN_LBL, FID.LAYOUT, FID.ANCHOR, FID.BUNDLE_KEY, FID.MIN_LENGTH, FID.MAX_LENGTH, FID.MAX_NUM_LINES, FID.MAX_CHAR_PER_LINES, FID.TOTAL_COLS, FID.ROW_SPAN, FID.COL_SPAN, FID.VALIDATION_TYPE, FID.RAW_KEYS, FID.RAW_VALUES, FID.INCLUDE_SELECT_IND, FID.CONTAINER_IND, FID.VISIBLE_IND, FID.EDITABLE_IND, FID.READ_ONLY_IND, FID.REQUIRED_IND, FID.LOOKUP_IND, FID.COLLAPSIBLE_FIRST_IND, FID.DS_VIEW_ID, FID.DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID, FID.DS_VAL_COLUMN_ID, FID.WIDGET_ID, (SELECT DISTINCT VCD.DATA_TYPE FROM VIEW_COLUMN_DEFINITION VCD JOIN WIDGET_DEFINITION WD ON(WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID=VCD.VIEW_ID) WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID =FID.WIDGET_ID AND VCD.COLUMN_ID =FID.DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID ) COLUMN_TYPE, (SELECT DISTINCT VD.PRODUCT FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID ) AS WIDGET_PRODUCT_CODE, (SELECT DISTINCT VD.SUB_PRODUCT FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID ) AS WIDGET_SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, (SELECT DISTINCT VD.FUNCTION_CODE FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID ) AS WIDGET_FUNCTION_CODE, FID.CONDITIONAL_IND, FID.CACHE_DATA_IND, HIDE_LABEL, FID.CONTEXT_CONATINER_IND, FID.CRITERIA_ID_REQ_IND, FID.VALIDATE_ON_SWITCH_IND, FID.LINKED_CURR_COL , FID.RESIZABLE_IND, FID.UPLOAD_FILE_FORMATS, FID.MULTI_LANG_IND, FID.LABEL_ALIGN_TYPE, FID.PRINT_REQUIRED_IND, FID.CHANNEL_ID, FID.APPEND_CURRENCY_MODE, FID.TOGGLE_IND, FID.LABEL_CHAR_COUNT, 1 AS LEVEL
FROM FORM_ITEM_DEFINITION FID JOIN FORM_ITEM_TYPE FIT ON (FIT.TYPE_ID= FID.ITEM_TYPE) WHERE FID.FORM_ID IN
#FORM_IDS[]#
AND FID.PARENT_ID IN
#FORM_IDS[]#
UNION ALL SELECT N.rank||' '||to_char(NEXTLEVEL.POSITION) AS rank, NEXTLEVEL.ITEM_KEY, NEXTLEVEL.ITEM_ID, NEXTLEVEL.FORM_ID, NEXTLEVEL.PARENT_ID, NEXTLEVEL.TYPE_NAME, NEXTLEVEL.ITEM_TYPE, NEXTLEVEL.POSITION, NEXTLEVEL.DISPLAY_NM_KEY, NEXTLEVEL.PLAIN_LBL, NEXTLEVEL.LAYOUT, NEXTLEVEL.ANCHOR, NEXTLEVEL.BUNDLE_KEY, NEXTLEVEL.MIN_LENGTH, NEXTLEVEL.MAX_LENGTH, NEXTLEVEL.MAX_NUM_LINES, NEXTLEVEL.MAX_CHAR_PER_LINES, NEXTLEVEL.TOTAL_COLS, NEXTLEVEL.ROW_SPAN, NEXTLEVEL.COL_SPAN, NEXTLEVEL.VALIDATION_TYPE, NEXTLEVEL.RAW_KEYS, NEXTLEVEL.RAW_VALUES, NEXTLEVEL.INCLUDE_SELECT_IND, NEXTLEVEL.CONTAINER_IND, NEXTLEVEL.VISIBLE_IND, NEXTLEVEL.EDITABLE_IND, NEXTLEVEL.READ_ONLY_IND, NEXTLEVEL.REQUIRED_IND, NEXTLEVEL.LOOKUP_IND, NEXTLEVEL.COLLAPSIBLE_FIRST_IND, NEXTLEVEL.DS_VIEW_ID, NEXTLEVEL.DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID, NEXTLEVEL.DS_VAL_COLUMN_ID, NEXTLEVEL.WIDGET_ID, NEXTLEVEL.COLUMN_TYPE, NEXTLEVEL.WIDGET_PRODUCT_CODE, NEXTLEVEL.WIDGET_SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, NEXTLEVEL.WIDGET_FUNCTION_CODE, NEXTLEVEL.CONDITIONAL_IND, NEXTLEVEL.CACHE_DATA_IND, NEXTLEVEL.HIDE_LABEL, NEXTLEVEL.CONTEXT_CONATINER_IND, NEXTLEVEL.CRITERIA_ID_REQ_IND, NEXTLEVEL.VALIDATE_ON_SWITCH_IND, NEXTLEVEL.LINKED_CURR_COL , NEXTLEVEL.RESIZABLE_IND, NEXTLEVEL.UPLOAD_FILE_FORMATS, NEXTLEVEL.MULTI_LANG_IND, NEXTLEVEL.LABEL_ALIGN_TYPE, NEXTLEVEL.PRINT_REQUIRED_IND, NEXTLEVEL.CHANNEL_ID, NEXTLEVEL.APPEND_CURRENCY_MODE, NEXTLEVEL.TOGGLE_IND, NEXTLEVEL.LABEL_CHAR_COUNT, N.LEVEL+1 AS LEVEL FROM ( SELECT FID.FORM_ID|| '|||' || FID.ITEM_ID ITEM_KEY, FID.ITEM_ID, FID.FORM_ID, FID.PARENT_ID, FIT.TYPE_NAME, FIT.TYPE_NAME as ITEM_TYPE, FID.POSITION, FID.DISPLAY_NM_KEY, FID.PLAIN_LBL, FID.LAYOUT, FID.ANCHOR, FID.BUNDLE_KEY, FID.MIN_LENGTH, FID.MAX_LENGTH, FID.MAX_NUM_LINES, FID.MAX_CHAR_PER_LINES, FID.TOTAL_COLS, FID.ROW_SPAN, FID.COL_SPAN, FID.VALIDATION_TYPE, FID.RAW_KEYS, FID.RAW_VALUES, FID.INCLUDE_SELECT_IND, FID.CONTAINER_IND, FID.VISIBLE_IND, FID.EDITABLE_IND, FID.READ_ONLY_IND, FID.REQUIRED_IND, FID.LOOKUP_IND, FID.COLLAPSIBLE_FIRST_IND, FID.DS_VIEW_ID, FID.DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID, FID.DS_VAL_COLUMN_ID, FID.WIDGET_ID, (SELECT VCD.DATA_TYPE FROM VIEW_COLUMN_DEFINITION VCD JOIN WIDGET_DEFINITION WD ON(WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID=VCD.VIEW_ID) WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID =FID.WIDGET_ID AND VCD.COLUMN_ID =FID.DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID ) COLUMN_TYPE, (SELECT VD.PRODUCT FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID ) AS WIDGET_PRODUCT_CODE, (SELECT VD.SUB_PRODUCT FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID ) AS WIDGET_SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, (SELECT VD.FUNCTION_CODE FROM WIDGET_DEFINITION WD INNER JOIN VIEW_DEFINITION VD ON VD.VIEW_ID = WD.DEFAULT_VIEW_ID WHERE WD.WIDGET_ID=FID.WIDGET_ID ) AS WIDGET_FUNCTION_CODE, FID.CONDITIONAL_IND, FID.CACHE_DATA_IND, HIDE_LABEL, FID.CONTEXT_CONATINER_IND, FID.CRITERIA_ID_REQ_IND, FID.VALIDATE_ON_SWITCH_IND, FID.LINKED_CURR_COL , FID.RESIZABLE_IND, FID.UPLOAD_FILE_FORMATS, FID.MULTI_LANG_IND, FID.LABEL_ALIGN_TYPE, FID.PRINT_REQUIRED_IND, FID.CHANNEL_ID, FID.APPEND_CURRENCY_MODE, FID.TOGGLE_IND, FID.LABEL_CHAR_COUNT FROM FORM_ITEM_DEFINITION FID JOIN FORM_ITEM_TYPE FIT ON (FIT.TYPE_ID = FID.ITEM_TYPE)) NEXTLEVEL, N WHERE (( N.FORM_ID = NEXTLEVEL.FORM_ID AND N.ITEM_ID = NEXTLEVEL.PARENT_ID AND N.ITEM_TYPE != '18' ) AND N.ITEM_TYPE != '18' ) OR (N.ITEM_ID = NEXTLEVEL.FORM_ID AND NEXTLEVEL.PARENT_ID = NEXTLEVEL.FORM_ID AND N.ITEM_TYPE = '18' )) SELECT ITEM_KEY, ITEM_ID, FORM_ID, PARENT_ID, TYPE_NAME, ITEM_TYPE, POSITION, DISPLAY_NM_KEY, PLAIN_LBL, LAYOUT, ANCHOR, BUNDLE_KEY, MIN_LENGTH, MAX_LENGTH, MAX_NUM_LINES, MAX_CHAR_PER_LINES, TOTAL_COLS, ROW_SPAN, COL_SPAN, VALIDATION_TYPE, RAW_KEYS, RAW_VALUES, INCLUDE_SELECT_IND, CONTAINER_IND, VISIBLE_IND, EDITABLE_IND, READ_ONLY_IND, REQUIRED_IND, LOOKUP_IND, COLLAPSIBLE_FIRST_IND, DS_VIEW_ID, DS_KEY_COLUMN_ID, DS_VAL_COLUMN_ID, WIDGET_ID, COLUMN_TYPE, WIDGET_PRODUCT_CODE, WIDGET_SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, WIDGET_FUNCTION_CODE, CONDITIONAL_IND, CACHE_DATA_IND, HIDE_LABEL, CONTEXT_CONATINER_IND, CRITERIA_ID_REQ_IND, VALIDATE_ON_SWITCH_IND, LINKED_CURR_COL , RESIZABLE_IND, UPLOAD_FILE_FORMATS, MULTI_LANG_IND, LABEL_ALIGN_TYPE, PRINT_REQUIRED_IND, CHANNEL_ID, APPEND_CURRENCY_MODE, TOGGLE_IND, LABEL_CHAR_COUNT FROM N ORDER BY RANK

SELECT MIME_TYPE FROM MIME_TYPE_MASTER WHERE MIME_TYPE_ID in ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(#UPLOAD_FILE_FORMATS#,'[^,]+', 1, level) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(#UPLOAD_FILE_FORMATS#, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL )

SELECT CRITERIA_FORMID, CRITERIA_FROM, CRITERIA_TO, CRITERIA_LABEL, WIDGET_ID, DEFAULT_LABEL_IND FROM EXPORT_CRITERIA WHERE CRITERIA_FORMID IN
#FORM_IDS[]#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FORM_FILE_ATTACHMENT ( ATTACHMENT_REF_NUM, ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME, ATTACHMENT_REF_FILE_NAME, ATTACHMENT_FILE_SIZE, OD_GCIF, OD_MAKER_ID, OD_MAKER_DATE ) VALUES (? ,?, ?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE)
sqlMap.select: SELECT ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME, ATTACHMENT_REF_FILE_NAME, ATTACHMENT_FILE_SIZE, OD_MAKER_DATE FROM FORM_FILE_ATTACHMENT WHERE ATTACHMENT_REF_NUM = #ATTACHMENT_REFERENCE_NO# AND OD_GCIF = #OD_GCIF# AND OD_MAKER_ID = #OD_MAKER_ID#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FORM_FILE_ATTACHMENT WHERE ATTACHMENT_REF_NUM = #ATTACHMENT_REFERENCE_NO# AND OD_GCIF = #OD_GCIF# AND OD_MAKER_ID = #OD_MAKER_ID#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT MIME_TYPE FROM MIME_TYPE_MASTER WHERE MIME_TYPE_ID IN
#GET_USERIMAGE_SUPPORTED_FORMATS[]#
